Ability.Name: Initial
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_CuteOne.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_CuteOne.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end rotchange = 0 end
shcom() timecheck() --Dummy 5min DPS Test if UnitExists("target") then if cTime >= 300 and dummy() then StopAttack() ClearTarget() print("5 Minute Dummy Test Concluded - Profile Stopped") --PQR_StopRotation() end end
if UnitBuffID("target",117961) then StopAttack() end
------ABILITIES------- af = 1066 --Aquatic Form bar = 22812 --Barkskin bf = 5487 --Bear Form ber = 106951 --Berserk bm = 33878 --Bear Mangle bs = 779 --Bear Swipe bt = 77758 --Bear Thrash cf = 768 --Cat Form cy = 33786 --Cyclone dsh = 1850 --Dash er = 339 --Entangling Roots ff = 770 --Faerie Fire fb = 22568 --Ferocious Bite fr = 22842 --Frenzied Regeneration grl = 6795 --Growl ht = 5185 --Healing Touch hib = 2637 --Hibernate how = 108292 --Heart of the Wild hur = 16914 --Hurricane inc = 106731 --Incarnation: King of the Jungle inn = 29166 --Innervate lac = 33745 --Lacerate ma = 22570 --Maim mgl = 33876 --Mangle mow = 1126 --Mark of the Wild ml = 6807 --Maul mu = 106922 --Might of Ursoc mb = 5211 --Mighty Bash mf = 8921 --Moonfire ng = 16689 --Nature's Grasp ns = 132158 --Nature's Swiftness nv = 124974 --Nature's Vigil pnc = 9005 --Pounce prl = 5215 --Prowl rber= 26297 --Troll Racial - Berserking rk = 1822 --Rake rvf = 102545 --Ravage! rvg = 6785 --Ravage rb = 20484 --Rebirth rej = 774 --Rejuvenation rc = 2782 --Remove Corruption rv = 50769 --Revive rp = 1079 --Rip sr = 52610 --Savage Roar shr = 5221 --Shred sb = 80965 --Skull Bash sth = 2908 --Soothe str = 77764 --Stampeding Roar si = 61336 --Survival Instincts sff = 40120 --Swift Flight Form sw = 62078 --Swipe sym = 110309 --Symbiosis thr = 106832 --Thrash tf = 5217 --Tiger's Fury tq = 740 --Tranquility trf = 783 --Travel Form ty = 132469 --Typhoon wth = 5176 --Wrath
------PROCS------ ps = 16974 --Predatory Swiftness wa = 113746 --Weakened Armor - Faerie Fire Debuff cc = 135700 --Clearcasting dcd = 108381 --Dream of Cenarius Damage Buff dch = 108382 --Dream of Cenarius Heal Buff srf = 114236 --Shred Glyph inb = 102543 --Incarnation: King of the Jungle buff
-----SYMBIOSIS SPELLS------ symdk = 122282 --Death Coil symhtr = 110597 --Play Dead symmag = 110693 --Frost Nova symmon = 126449 --Clash sympal = 110700 --Divine Shield sympri = 110715 --Dispersion symrog = 110730 --Redirect symsha = 110807 --Feral Spirit symloc = 110810 --Soul Swap symwar = 112997 --Shattering Blow
------TALENTS/GLYPHS/TIER 15------ -- Dream of Cenarius Talent Check if select(5,GetTalentInfo(17))==true then doct = true else doct = false end -- Shred Glyph Check if GlyphCheck(114234)==true then srg = true else srg = false end -- Savage Roar Glyph Check if GlyphCheck(127540)==true then svg = true else svg = false end -- Tier 15 Item Count if giid(p,1)==96581 or giid(p,1)==95237 or giid(p,1)==95837 then t15head = 1 else t15head = 0 end if giid(p,3)==96583 or giid(p,3)==95239 or giid(p,3)==95839 then t15shoulder = 1 else t15shoulder = 0 end if giid(p,5)==96579 or giid(p,5)==95235 or giid(p,5)==95835 then t15chest = 1 else t15chest = 0 end if giid(p,7)==96582 or giid(p,7)==95238 or giid(p,7)==95838 then t15leg = 1 else t15leg = 0 end if giid(p,10)==96580 or giid(p,10)==95236 or giid(p,10)==95836 then t15hand = 1 else t15hand = 0 end t15count = t15head + t15shoulder + t15chest + t15leg + t15hand -- Rune of Reorigination - Trash Variable if rorothr==nil then rorothr = 0 end -- Symbiosis if symcast==nil then symcast = 0 end
------BUFF/DEBUFF TRACKING------ -- Renataki's Soul Charm if select(4,ubid(p,138737)) == nil then rscbuff = 0 else rscbuff = select(4,ubid(p,138737)) end -- Dream of Cenarius Stack Count if select(4,ubid(p,dcd)) == nil then docbuff = 0 else docbuff = select(4,ubid(p,dcd)) end -- Rip Tracker and Attack Power Set if docbuff == 0 or rscbuff <= 5 then crpd = (113 + 320 * 5 * 1 + .0484 * 5 * UnitAttackPower("Player") * 1) * (1 + (25.04 + GetCombatRating(26) / 191.7) / 100) else crpd = (113 + 320 * 5 * 1 + .0484 * 5 * UnitAttackPower("Player") * 1) * (1 + (25.04 + GetCombatRating(26) / 191.7) / 100) * 1.25 end if udbid(t,rp,p) and plvl >= 20 then rpr = (select(7, udbid(t,rp,p)) - GetTime()) rpp = round2(((crpd / rpd)*100),2) else if plvl < 20 then rpr = 999 else rpr = 0 rpd = 0 rpp = 125 end end -- Rake Tracker and Attack Power Set if docbuff == 0 or rscbuff <= 8 then crkd = (495 + (.285 * UnitAttackPower("player"))) * (1 + GetMasteryEffect() / 100) else crkd = (495 + (.285 * UnitAttackPower("player"))) * (1 + GetMasteryEffect() / 100) * 1.25 end if udbid(t,rk,p) then rkr = (select(7, udbid(t,rk,p)) - GetTime()) rkp = round2(((crkd / rkd)*100),2) else rkr = 0 --rkd = 0 rkp = 125 end -- Savage Roar Tracker if ubid(p,sr) and plvl >= 18 then srr = (select(7, ubid(p,sr)) - GetTime()) else if plvl < 18 then srr = 999 else srr = 0 end end -- Berserk - Unit Power requirement modifier as Berserk makes energy usage half if ubid(p,ber) then pow = pow*2 else pow = UnitPower(p) end -- Weakened Armor Tracker and Stack Count if udbid(t,wa) then wac = select(4, udbid(t,wa)) war = (select(7, udbid(t,wa)) - GetTime()) else wac = 0 war = 0 end -- Trash Tracker if udbid(t,thr,p) then thrr = (select(7, udbid(t,thr,p)) - GetTime()) else thrr = 0 end -- Nil Catch for Current Rake Attack Power Variable if crkap == nil or outcom then crkap = 0 end -- Nil Catch for Current Rip Attack Power Variable if crpap == nil or outcom then crpap = 0 end -- Predatory Swiftness Tracker if ubid(p,ps) then psr = (select(7, ubid(p,ps)) - GetTime()) else psr = 0 end -- Savage Roar / Rip Tracking Comparison if plvl >= 20 then if (rpr - srr) < 0 then srrpdiff = -(rpr - srr) else srrpdiff = (rpr - srr) end end -- Nil Catch for Total New Savage Roar Duration if srt == nil then srt = 0 end -- Opening Sequence Trigger if plvl >= 20 then if outcom then opener = 1 elseif srr > 0 and rkr > 0 and rpr > 0 then opener = 0 end end
------TOGGLES/HOTKEYS------ -- CD Switch if PQ_CDMode==nil then PQ_CDMode = "Boss" end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_CDTimer > 0.25 then PQ_CDTimer = GetTime()
if not PQ_CD then PQ_CD = CD_BossOnly PQ_CDMode = "Boss" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECBoss Only|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif PQ_CD == CD_BossOnly then PQ_CD = CD_Auto PQ_CDMode = "On" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400On|cffffffff", "Notice") else PQ_CD = false PQ_CDMode = "Off" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143COff|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- AoE/Single Switch if AOEMode == nil then AOEMode = 0 end if PQ_Rot == nil then PQ_Rot = "Single" end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_AOETimer > 0.25 then PQ_AOETimer = GetTime()
if PQ_AOE then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" PQR_SwapRotation("Kitty-Single (CuteOne)") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==0 then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 1 PQ_Rot = "Hybrid" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff79BAECHybrid|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==1 then PQ_AOE = true AOEMode = 2 PQ_Rot = "Multi" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff", "Notice") PQR_SwapRotation("Kitty-Multi (CuteOne)") end end
-- Symbiosis Auto/Manual Switch if SymMode == nil then SymMode = 0 end if PQ_Symb == nil then PQ_Symb = "Auto" end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_SymTimer > 1 then PQ_SymTimer = GetTime()
if PQ_Sym then PQ_Sym = false SymMode = 0 PQ_Symb = "Auto" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CSymbiosis Mode: |cff006400Auto|cffffffff", "Notice") else PQ_Sym = true SymMode = 1 PQ_Symb = "Manual" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CSymbiosis Mode: |cffDC143CManual|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- PQI Addon: Toggle Status Display PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'CD-Mode: '..PQ_CDMode..' --- '..'AOE-Mode: '..PQ_Rot..' --- '..'Sym-Mode: '..PQ_Symb) --PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'rkd: '..round2(rkd,2)..' --- '..'calcrk: '..round2(crkd,2)..'---'..'rkp: '..rkp)
------ETC------ -- Data File Functions BehindFunc() ttd("target") GroupInfo() SymMem() if hastar then bossID = tonumber(UnitGUID(t):sub(-13, -9), 16) else bossID = 0 end
--Low Level if plvl < 6 then if check(mf) and not udbid(t,mf) then cast(gsi(mf)) elseif check(wth) then cast(gsi(wth)) end end
if not IsMounted() and (not UnitExists("target") or UnitIsDead("target")) then if incom and (AOEMode==1 or AOEMode==2) then TargetNearestEnemy() end if sir(gsi(108557),t)==1 then RunMacroText("/startattack") end end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua: if incom and not ubid(p,prl) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and pow>=75 and check(ber) and ubid(p,sr) and ubid(p,tf) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 and cd(gsi(tf)) > 6 and ttd(t)>=18 then cast(gsi(ber)) end

Ability.Name: Faerie Fire
Ability.Lua: if check(ff) and opener==0 then if incom or (outcom and select(2,IsInInstance())~="raid" and select(2,IsInInstance())~="party") then if not udbid(t,wa) and not ubid(p,prl) then if war==0 or wac < 3 then cast(gsi(ff)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Ferocious Bite
Ability.Lua: if check(fb) and pow>=25 and not HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) and rscbuff<=5 then if thp > 25 and srr > 3 and cp==5 then if bossID == 63053 then cast(gsi(fb)) end if pow>=50 and rpr > 8 and (docbuff==0 or (docbuff==2 and rkp < 108) or (docbuff==1 and rpp < 108)) then cast(gsi(fb)) end if ((srr <= 3 and rpr > 0) or ttd(t) < 15) then cast(gsi(fb)) end end if thp <= 25 and rpr > 0 then if cp==5 and pow>=50 and srr > 3 then cast(gsi(fb)) end if cp>=1 and rpr > 0 and rpr<=3 then cast(gsi(fb)) end end if pow>=50 and cp==5 and srr<=4 and rpr > 8 then cast(gsi(fb)) end if pow>=25 and cp==5 and srr<=3 and rpr > 8 then cast(gsi(fb)) end if pow>=25 and cp>=3 and ttd(t)<=5 then cast(gsi(fb)) end end

Ability.Name: Healing Touch
Ability.Lua: if incom and plvl>=26 then if ubid(p,ps) and cp>=4 then if members[1].HP < php and not udbid(members[1].Unit, 137341, nil) and not LineOfSight(members[1].Unit) then PQR_CustomTarget = members[1].Unit cast(gsi(ht),PQR_CustomTarget) else cast(gsi(ht),p) end end if ubid(p,ps) and psr<=1.5 then if members[1].HP < php and not udbid(members[1].Unit, 137341, nil) and not LineOfSight(members[1].Unit) then PQR_CustomTarget = members[1].Unit cast(gsi(ht),PQR_CustomTarget) else cast(gsi(ht),p) end end if not ubid(p,ps) and ((cp==5 and ubid(p,dch)) or (php<=75 and not ubid(p,dch))) then cast(gsi(ns)) end if ubid(p,ns) then if members[1].HP < php and not udbid(members[1].Unit, 137341, nil) and not LineOfSight(members[1].Unit) then PQR_CustomTarget = members[1].Unit cast(gsi(ht),PQR_CustomTarget) else cast(gsi(ht),p) end end end

Ability.Name: Forms
Ability.Lua: if not pcasting and not pchannel and not ubid(p,how) and not ubid(p,mu) then if (incom or IsOutdoors()==nil) and not ubid(p,cf) and not ubid(p,bf) and not (IsMounted() or ubid(p,sff)) then cast(gsi(cf),nil) end if outcom and not ubid(p,cf) and IsSwimming()~=nil and not ubid(p,af) then cast(gsi(af),nil) end if outcom and not ubid(p,cf) and IsFlyableArea()==nil and IsOutdoors()~=nil and IsSwimming()==nil and GetUnitSpeed(p)>0 and not IsMounted()==nil then cast(gsi(trf),nil) end end

Ability.Name: Mark of the Wild
Ability.Lua: ---Mark of the Wild--- if (not IsMounted() or ubid(p,sff)) and outcom and plvl >= 62 and not ubid(p,104934) and not ubid(p,104269) then for i=1,#members do if not HaveBuff(members[i].Unit,{115921,20217,1126,90363}) and (#members==select(5,GetInstanceInfo()) or select(2,IsInInstance())=="none") then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Interrupts
Ability.Lua: if incom and cd(mb)==0 and sir(gsi(mb),t)==1 and (cd(gsi(sb))~=0 and cd(gsi(sb))<=14) and (Interruptable(t,mb) or tcasting) then cast(gsi(mb),t) end if incom and check(sb) and Interruptable(t,sb) then cast(gsi(sb),t) end if incom and cd(ty)==0 and Interruptable(t,ty) then cast(gsi(ty),t) end

Ability.Name: Prowl
Ability.Lua: if outcom and not IsStealthed() and canattack and ubid(p,cf) and check(prl) then cast(gsi(prl)) end

Ability.Name: Rake
Ability.Lua: if check(rk) and (srr > 1 or srg==false) and (pow>=35 or ubid(p,cc) ) then if HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) and cp < 5 then cast(gsi(rk)) rkd = crkd end if (rkr < 3 or rkp > 108) then cast(gsi(rk)) rkd = crkd end end

Ability.Name: Ravage
Ability.Lua: if IsStealthed() and ubid(p,sr) and (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) and behind and check(rvg) and plvl>=54 then cast(gsi(rvg)) end if IsStealthed() and ((ubid(p,sr) and check(sr)) or plvl < 54 or srg==false) and (not behind or plvl < 54) and check(mgl) then cast(gsi(mgl)) end

Ability.Name: Rip
Ability.Lua: if check(rp) and (pow>=30 or ubid(p,cc)) and cp==5 and srr > 1 and bossID~=63053 and ttd(t)>=15 then if HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) then cast(gsi(rp)) rpd = crpd end if (rpr < 6 or rpp > 108) then cast(gsi(rp)) rpd = crpd end end

Ability.Name: Savage Roar
Ability.Lua: if cp>=1 and rpr > 0 and rpr<=3 and thp<=25 and not ubid(p,bf) then return false else srt = (12 + (cp*6)) if not ubid(p,how) and not ubid(p,bf) then if (IsStealthed() or incom) and canattack and srr<=1 and pow>=25 and (svg==true or cp > 0) then cast(gsi(sr)) end if incom and (svg==true or cp > 0) and rpr > 0 and rpr < 10 and srt>=(srr + 12) and srrpdiff <= 4 and pow>=25 and not ubid(p,bf) then cast(gsi(sr)) end end end

Ability.Name: Shred
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and rkr > 3 and cp < 5 and not HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) and not ubid(p,bf) then if ubid(p,inb) and (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) then cast(gsi(rvf)) end if ubid(p,81022,"EXACT") then cast(gsi(rvf)) end if (pow>=35 or ubid(p,cc)) and not ubid(p,inc) and not ubid(p,81022,"EXACT") then if t15count >= 2 then if ubid(p,ber) then if srg==true and (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) then cast(gsi(srf)) else if behind == false then cast(gsi(mgl)) else if (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) and behind == true then cast(gsi(shr)) end end end else cast(gsi(mgl)) end else if (ubid(p,ber) or ubid(p,tf)) then if srg==true and (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) then cast(gsi(srf)) else if behind == false then cast(gsi(mgl)) else if (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) and behind == true then cast(gsi(shr)) end end end else if behind == false then cast(gsi(mgl)) else if (pow>=45 or ubid(p,cc)) and behind == true then cast(gsi(shr)) end end end end end end

Ability.Name: Thrash
Ability.Lua: --local bossID = tonumber(UnitGUID(t):sub(-13, -9), 16) if incom and plvl >= 28 and (ubid(p,cc) or pow>=50) --Clearcasting Buff / Power Check --and srr > 3 --Savage Roar Active --and rkr > 3 --Rake Active and rpr > 3 --Rip Active and thrr<=3 --Thrash about to fall off or not present and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 --In Range and ttd(t)>=6 and not (HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120})) and bossID ~= (69700 or 69701) then cast(gsi(thr)) --Apply Thrash end

Ability.Name: Tiger's Fury
Ability.Lua: if incom and pow <= 35 and cd(tf)==0 and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 and not ubid(p,ber) then cast(gsi(tf)) end

Ability.Name: Swipe
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode~=0 and incom and pow>=45 and (thrr > 0 or AOEMode==1) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 then if AOEMode==1 and rkr > 3 and cp < 5 then cast(gsi(sw)) else cast(gsi(sw)) end end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if (outcom or plvl<26) and not ubid(p,rej) and PQR_SpellAvailable(rej) then if php<=20 then cast(gsi(rej)) end else if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or not UnitExists("Target") or UnitBuffID("Player",80169) or UnitBuffID("Player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Target") or UnitBuffID("target",117961) or not UnitAffectingCombat("Player") --or (UnitBuffID("Player",69369) or UnitBuffID("Player",132158)) then return true end end

Ability.Name: Defensive
Ability.Lua: if incom and not ubid(p,prl) then if php<=50 and check(bar) then cast(gsi(bar)) end if php<=30 and check(mu) then cast(gsi(mu)) end if php<=25 and check(si) then cast(gsi(si)) end if php < 30 and GetItemCount(5512,false,false) > 0 and ( select(2, GetItemCooldown(5512)) == 0 ) then UseItemByName(5512) return true end if ubid(p,mu) and check(fr) then cast(gsi(fr)) end end if UnitExists("mouseover") and UnitAffectingCombat(p) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost("mouseover") and UnitCanCooperate(p, "mouseover") and sir(gsi(rb),"mouseover") == 1 and cd(rb) == 0 and not PQR_IsOutOfSight("mouseover") and not UnitCastingInfo(p) and UnitChannelInfo(p) == nil and (ubid(p,ns) or ubid(p,ps)) then cast(gsi(rb),"mouseover") end

Ability.Name: Incarnation: KotJ
Ability.Lua: if incom and not ubid(p,prl) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and ubid(p,ber) and check(inc) and ubid(p,sr) and ubid(p,tf) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 and ttd(t)>=15 then cast(gsi(inc)) end

Ability.Name: Thrash (AoE)
Ability.Lua: if incom and (ubid(p,cc) or pow>=50) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 and not udbid(t,thr,p) then if HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) and rorothr==0 then cast(gsi(thr)) rorothr = 1 end if not ubid(t,thr,p) then cast(gsi(thr)) end end if not HaveBuff(p,{139121,139117,139120}) then rorothr = 0 end

Ability.Name: Racials
Ability.Lua:
---Troll Berserking if incom and not ubid(p,prl) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and pow>=75 and check(rber) and ubid(p,sr) and ubid(p,tf) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 then cast(gsi(rber),nil) end
if incom and GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,10) == 0 and not ubid(p, ber) then UseInventoryItem(10) end

Ability.Name: Symbiosis
Ability.Lua:
if plvl >= 68 and outcom and SymMode==0 and select(2,IsInInstance())~="none" then if not ubid(p,sym) and cd(sym)==0 then if PQR_CustomTarget ~= symmem[1].Unit then PQR_CustomTarget = symmem[1].Unit if PQR_CustomTarget == "" or PQR_CustomTarget == "player" then return false end end if sir(gsi(inn),PQR_CustomTarget)==1 then TargetUnit(PQR_CustomTarget) end if UnitExists(t) and UnitCanCooperate(p,t) and (UnitInParty(t) or UnitInRaid(t)) and not pcasting then symcast = 1 cast(gsi(sym),PQR_CustomTarget) end end if symcast==1 and not pcasting and HaveBuff("target",{110478, 110479, 110482, 110483, 110484, 110485, 110486, 110488, 110490, 110491}) then symcast = 0 ClearTarget() end end
if ubid(p,sym) and incom then if IsUsableSpell(symwar) and cd(symwar)==0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(symwar)) end if IsUsableSpell(symsha) and cd(symsha)==0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(symsha)) end if IsUsableSpell(sympri) and cd(sympri)==0 and php<=25 then cast(gsi(sympri)) end if IsUsableSpell(sympal) and cd(sympal)==0 and php<=25 then cast(gsi(sympal)) end if IsUsableSpell(symdk) and sir(gsi(rk),t)~=1 and sir(gsi(rc),t)==1 and pow>=40 then cast(gsi(symdk)) end if IsUsableSpell(symhun) and cd(symhun)==0 then threat={UnitDetailedThreatSituation(p,t)} if (threat[1]==1 or (threat[5] ~=nil and threat[5]>25000 and threat[3]>90)) then cast(gsi(symhun)) end end if IsUsableSpell(symloc) then
end if IsUsableSpell(symrog) then if cps == nil then cps = 0 end if outcom then csp = 0 end local ComboPoints = GetComboPoints("player", "target") if UnitExists(t) and ComboPoints ~= cps and check(symrog) and cps~=0 then cast(gsi(symrog),t) end end if IsUsableSpell(symmag) and cd(symmag)==0 and php<=25 then cast(gsi(symmag)) end if IsUsableSpell(symmon) then
end end

Ability.Name: Nature's Vigil
Ability.Lua: if incom and not ubid(p,prl) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and pow>=75 and check(nv) and ubid(p,sr) and ubid(p,tf) and sir(gsi(mgl),t)==1 and ttd(t)>=15 then cast(gsi(nv)) end

Ability.Name: PQIInit
Remove Corruption
Ability.Lua:
--if check(rc) -- and (udbid(p,136587,nil) --Horridon: Venom Priest: Venom Bolt -- or ubid(p,136512,nil)) --Horridon: Armani'shi Beast Shaman: Hex of Confusion --then -- cast(gsi(rc),p) --end
if ValidDispel(p) and cd(rc)==0 then cast(gsi(rc),p) end if ValidDispel("mouseover") and cd(rc)==0 then cast(gsi(rc),"mouseover") end

Ability.Name: Single Override
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode == 0 then rotchange = 1 end if AOEMode ~= 0 and rotchange==0 then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff", "Notice") rotchange = 1 end

Ability.Name: Multi Override
Ability.Lua: if rotchange == nil then rotchange = 0 end if AOEMode == 2 then rotchange = 1 end if AOEMode ~= 2 and rotchange==0 then PQ_AOE = true AOEMode = 2 PQ_Rot = "Multi" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff", "Notice") rotchange = 1 end

Ability.Name: Cyclone
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("focus") and sir(gsi(cy),"focus")==1 and cd(cy)==0 then cast(gsi(cy),"focus") end

Ability.Name: Heart of the Wild
Ability.Lua: if ubid(p,how) then if check(mf) and not udbid(t,mf) then cast(gsi(mf)) elseif check(wth) then cast(gsi(wth)) end end

Ability.Name: bear
Ability.Lua: if incom and if ubid(p,bf) and MangleCooldownTimeLeft == 0 then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() cast(gsi(bm)) end

Ability.Name: bear mangle
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitBuffID("player",5487) and MangleCooldownTimeLeft == 0 then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(33878))) end

Ability.Name: --DEFINES--
Ability.Lua:
PlayerEnergy = UnitPower("player")
if LFGDungeonReadyPopup:IsVisible() or StaticPopup1:IsVisible() then AcceptProposal() end
local MangleStart, MangleDuration = GetSpellCooldown(33878) MangleCooldownTimeLeft = (MangleStart + MangleDuration - GetTime()) if MangleCooldownTimeLeft < 0 then MangleCooldownTimeLeft = 0 end
local ThrashStart, ThrashDuration = GetSpellCooldown(77758) ThrashCooldownTimeLeft = (ThrashStart + ThrashDuration - GetTime()) if ThrashCooldownTimeLeft < 0 then ThrashCooldownTimeLeft = 0 end
local FFstart, FFduration = GetSpellCooldown(770) FFCooldownTimeLeft = (FFstart + FFduration - GetTime()) if FFCooldownTimeLeft < 0 then FFCooldownTimeLeft = 0 end
local WeakenedArmor, _, _, LocalWeakenedArmorStacks, _, _, WeakenedArmorEndTime = UnitDebuffID("target", 113746) if not WeakenedArmor then WeakenedArmorStacks = 0 WeakenedArmorTimeLeft = 0 end
local LacerateStart, LacerateDuration = GetSpellCooldown(33745) LacerateCooldownTimeLeft = (LacerateStart + LacerateDuration - GetTime()) if LacerateCooldownTimeLeft < 0 then LacerateCooldownTimeLeft = 0 end
local SwipeStart, SwipeDuration = GetSpellCooldown(779) SwipeCooldownTimeLeft = (SwipeStart + SwipeDuration - GetTime()) if SwipeCooldownTimeLeft < 0 then SwipeCooldownTimeLeft = 0 end

Ability.Name: Bear Thrash
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then if ThrashCooldownTimeLeft == 0 and UnitBuffID("player",5487) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(77758))) end end

Ability.Name: Bear Swipe
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and SwipeCooldownTimeLeft == 0 and UnitBuffID("player",5487) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(779))) end
